00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 
00035 #include "RNA_define.h"
00036 
00037 #include "BLO_sys_types.h"

00039 #include "BKE_mesh.h"
00040 #include "ED_mesh.h"
00041 
00042 #ifdef RNA_RUNTIME
00043 const char *rna_Mesh_unit_test_compare(struct Mesh *mesh, bContext *C, struct Mesh *mesh2)
00044 {
00045     const char *ret = mesh_cmp(mesh, mesh2, FLT_EPSILON*60);
00046     
00047     if (!ret)
00048         ret = "Same";
00049     
00050     return ret;
00051 }
00052 
00053 #else
00054 
00055 void RNA_api_mesh(StructRNA *srna)
00056 {
00057     FunctionRNA *func;
00058     PropertyRNA *parm;
00059 
00060     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "transform", "ED_mesh_transform");
00061     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Transform mesh vertices by a matrix");
00062     parm = RNA_def_float_matrix(func, "matrix", 4, 4, NULL, 0.0f, 0.0f, "", "Matrix", 0.0f, 0.0f);
00063     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00064 
00065     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "calc_normals", "ED_mesh_calc_normals");
00066     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Calculate vertex normals");
00067 
00068     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "calc_tessface", "ED_mesh_calc_tessface");
00069     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Calculate face tessellation (supports editmode too)");
00070 
00071     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "update", "ED_mesh_update");
00072     RNA_def_boolean(func, "calc_edges", 0, "Calculate Edges", "Force recalculation of edges");
00073     RNA_def_boolean(func, "calc_tessface", 0, "Calculate Tessellation", "Force recalculation of tessellation faces");
00074     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_CONTEXT);
00075 
00076     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "unit_test_compare", "rna_Mesh_unit_test_compare");
00077     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "mesh", "Mesh", "", "Mesh to compare to");
00078     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_CONTEXT);
00079     /* return value */
00080     parm = RNA_def_string(func, "result", "nothing", 64, "Return value", "String description of result of comparison");
00081     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00082 
00083     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "validate", "BKE_mesh_validate");
00084     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "validate geometry, return True when the mesh has had "
00085                                           "invalid geometry corrected/removed");
00086     RNA_def_boolean(func, "verbose", 0, "Verbose", "Output information about the errors found");
00087     parm = RNA_def_boolean(func, "result", 0, "Result", "");
00088     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
00089 }
00090 
00091 #endif
